Name: Anvil Centurion
Description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Combat

Built on Anvil's popular Atlas Platform, the Centurion presents a tactical solution for short-range anti-aircraft operations. Thanks to the Centurion’s custom energy-based AA turret, your forces can establish ground superiority by assuring immediate threats from above are dealt with quickly and efficiently.
